pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easy Handling of the CAMELS-CL Dataset // Download and handle spatial and temporal data from the CAMELS-CL dataset (Catchment Attributes and Meteorology for Large Sample Studies, Chile) https://camels.cr2.cl/, developed by Alvarez-Garreton et al. (2018) doi:10.5194/hess-22-5817-2018. The package does not generate new data, it only facilitates direct access to the original dataset for hydrological analyses.
